mapper.select: select id, name, code, single_count, single_amount, create_time, update_time from yjcycc_lottery.bs_play_category where id = #{id} limit 1
select id, name, code, single_count, single_amount, create_time, update_time from yjcycc_lottery.bs_play_category where id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into yjcycc_lottery.bs_play_category(name, code, single_count, single_amount, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{code}, #{singleCount}, #{singleAmount}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update yjcycc_lottery.bs_play_category
name = #{name},
code = #{code},
single_count = #{singleCount},
single_amount = #{singleAmount},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from yjcycc_lottery.bs_play_category where id in (${ids})
